title: Knife, possibly 800–1000
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Integral. Flat tapered pointed blade. Broad shoulder, handle with plinth and stylized figure. Grain pattern in steel overall.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, possibly 800–1000.
possibly 800–1000. steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-21.
